    • Method Detail

      • isOwner

        public boolean isOwner(User user,
                       Function function)
        Description copied from class: AbstractController
        This gets called when the role corresponding with the function has the READ_MINE/UPDATE_MINE/DELETE_MINE/CREATE_MINE action of the resource. It should determine whether the function is the "owner" of the object.
        Specified by:
        isOwner in class AbstractController<User>
        Parameters:
        user - object that should be checked
        function - the user field of function will be used to determine if the user is the owner
        Returns:
        true if the user is authorized to perform an action on the object if it has *_MINE rights.

      • update

        public User update(User user)
            throws DataAccessException,
                   UnAuthorizedException,
                   ObjectNotFoundException,
                   ConstraintViolationException
        Description copied from class: AbstractController
        Attempt to get the object of type T that has the UUID uuid
        Overrides:
        update in class AbstractController<User>
        Parameters:
        user - object that has to be updated. All fields can be different from what the fields are in the database except the uuid.
        Returns:
        Object of type T corresponding with the uuid
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - something went wrong with the database
        UnAuthorizedException - The function does not have the rights to perform this operation. The object can be updated if the user has the UPDATE_ALL Action of the Resource or READ_MINE and the user is the owner of the original object and the updated object.
        ObjectNotFoundException - there is no object with the same id as t.id
        ConstraintViolationException - one more fields of t are invalid

      • getFiltered

        public java.util.Collection<User> getFiltered(java.lang.String email,
                                              java.lang.String firstName,
                                              java.lang.String lastName)
                                       throws DataAccessException,
                                              UnAuthorizedException
        Parameters:
        email - Only returns users for which the email contains the pattern email
        firstName - Only returns users for which the firstName contains the pattern firstName
        lastName - Only returns users for which the lastName contains the pattern lastName
        Returns:
        all users, filtered on the arguments
        Throws:
        DataAccessException
        UnAuthorizedException
